instructions.import_instruction: Always collect data from the API calling /viewComplianceStatus. Show data for different assignment_type courses such that assignment_type=Mandatory and assignment_type=Role Essential
instructions.description: Before generating reports and charts, familiarise yourself with the structure and content of your data. Fetch data from the provided compliance status API and always show in tabular format.

Before generating reports, familiarise yourself with the prompt structure and content of your data. Knowing the columns and the type of data each column holds will help you formulate precise and effective prompts. Always generate tabular data format.

prompt_description.completion_date_range: Generate a compliance report using the data

prompt_description.course_wise_report: Show a course-wise breakdown of compliance and non-compliance

prompt_description.overdue_assignment: List all courses that were completed after the due date

prompt_description.employee_wise_compliance_report: Generate a compliance report for individual employees

prompt_description.monthly_completion_trend: Analyse the trend of course completion rates over the pastyear

prompt_description.annual_compliance_trend: Generate a trend analysis of annual compliance rates

prompt_description.course_popularity: Rank courses by the number of participants

prompt_description.employee_performance: Identify top-performing employees based on the number of compliant courses

prompt_description.completion_vs_duedate_correlation: Analyse the correlation between completion dates and due dates

prompt_description.course_wise_correlation_analysis: Provide a correlation analysis of completion dates and due dates by courses

prompt_description.top_performing_courses: Identify the top performing courses based on compliance rates

prompt_description.low_performing_courses: Identify the low performing courses based on compliance rates

instructions.description: The model can generate various types of charts to help visualise data effectively.

prompt_description.overall_compliance: Create a bar chart showing the number of compliant and non-compliant users

prompt_description.course_wise_compliance: Create a bar chart displaying the compliance status by Course

prompt_description.course_completion_by_assignment_type: Generate a bar chart showing the number of course completions by assignment type

prompt_description.monthly_compliance_counts: Create a bar chart illustrating monthly counts of compliant and non-compliant users

prompt_description.course_completion_performance: Show a bar chart comparing the completion performance for different courses

prompt_description.average_completion_time_per_course: Display the average completion time for each course using a bar chart

prompt_description.overall_complianc_percentage: Generate a pie chart displaying the percentage of compliant and non-compliant users

prompt_description.course_wise_compliance_percentage: Create a pie chart showing the percentage of compliant and non-compliant users for each course

prompt_description.assignment_type_distribution: Create a pie chart showing the distribution of different assignment types

prompt_description.trend_course_completion_over_time: Create a line chart showing the trend of course completion over time

prompt_description.monthly_compliance_trends: Generate a line chart displaying the monthly trend of compliance and non-compliance

prompt_description.annual_completion_rates: Generate a line chart showing annual course completion rates

prompt_description.trend_course_completion_over_time: Create a line chart showing the trend of course completion over time

prompt_description.monthly_compliance_trends: Generate a line chart displaying the monthly trend of compliance and non-compliance

prompt_description.annual_completion_rates: Generate a line chart showing annual course completion rates

prompt_description.compliance_date_completion: Create a histogram displaying the distribution of course completion dates

prompt_description.due_date_distribution: Generate a histogram showing the distribution of due dates for courses
